summary:
Dutch lawyer (LLM) licensed as attorney in Brazil. Any kind of reliable legal services in Brazil at European standards. 

Legal advice and law-practice in Brazil concerning Ethics, Compliance and Due Diligence. Brazilian and (international) Civil, Corporate, Criminal and Family Law. Currently reinforcing and finalizing curriculum in The Netherlands to become a registered Certified Compliance Professional (CCP).

authors.headline: Attorney-at-Law licensed in Brazil and Associated Partner at Nicodemos & Nederstigt Advogados Associados (Brazil) and Nederstigt Legal & Compliance (The Netherlands)

profile_positions.description:
(Legal) Risk assessment, Ethics, Compliance, CSR (Corporate Social Responsibility) and (partner/3rd party) Due Diligence, especially for European business (-people) and expats in Brazil. Certified member of NVRA (Dutch Association of Legal Advisers). Taking part in Round Table Sessions with Compliance-officers of (internationally operating or multinational) corporations organized by the Dutch Compliance Institute to stimulate exchange and innovations of Compliance in the Non-Financial Sector.

Dutch law-faculty completed (1994) at the University of Leiden, "meester in de rechten" and "civiel effect" (The Netherlands). Brazilian law-faculty completed suma cum laude (2008) at the Universidade do Grande Rio (Brazil). Currently reinforcing and finalizing curriculum in The Netherlands to become a registered Certified Compliance Professional (CCP).

Frans Nederstigt is an attorney-at-law since April 2009 registered at the Brazilian Bar Association (157257 OAB/RJ). Member of the Brazilian Compliance Institute since July 2019.
profile_positions.title: Specialist Lawyer "Nederstigt Legal & Compliance" (NLC)

profile_positions.description:
Legal consultancy and litigation for foreign and Brazilian Corporations and private persons in the areas of Brazilian and international (Private) Civil and Criminal Law. Including Compliance and Corporate, Contract, Consumer, Real Estate, Succession and Family Law. Acting in International Child Abduction Cases (Hague Convention). Formalized role as assistant of the Brazilian Public Prosecutor on behalf of victims of violent crimes and/or Human Rights Violations.

(Legal) Risk assessment, Ethics, Compliance CSR (Corporate Social Responsibility) and (partner/3rd party) Due Diligence. Organizing in loco investigations and legal analyses of status quo, preparation of legal documents, negotiation(s) and damage-control.

Specialist attorney listed by a.o. Dutch, Belgian, Norwegian and British diplomatic representations and the Dutch Center International Child Abduction (CIKO). 

NN Advogados Associados is an internationally orientated boutique Law Firm in Rio de Janeiro, in the niche market of highly specialized legal services for foreign individual and corporate clients, a.o. Dutch, Belgian and multinational public and private companies, bank(s), NGOs, foreign Ministries, educational and (international) sports organizations, entrepreneurs and diplomats.

Management of a highly qualified legal staff that consists of three managing partners, five senior attorneys, legal interns and administrative support.
 
Frans Nederstigt is an attorney-at-law since April 2009 registered at the Brazilian Bar Association (157.257 OAB/RJ).

Member of the Commission of International Law of the Brazilian Bar Association, Section Rio de Janeiro (OAB/RJ), mandate 2019-2021 and mandate 2022-2024.

Ex-practising immigration and administrative lawyer in and outside Courts in the Netherlands (1998-2004).
profile_positions.title: Managing Partner "Nicodemos & Nederstigt Advogados Associados" (N&N)

profile_positions.description:
Projeto Trama for combat and prevention of human trafficking is a Rio de Janeiro based consortium of three non-governmental organizations (grass-roots and community-based IBISS; Human Rights Organization Projeto Legal; Black Women's Organization Criola) and the law-faculty of the Unigranrio University. 

Between May 2015 and April 2017, on behalf of Projeto Trama, an official member of the National Anti-Human Trafficking Committee CONATRAP at the Federal Ministry of Justice (MJ/SNJ).

Liaising with Brazilian and international human rights NGO's (such as the Global Alliance Against Traffic in Women) in order to exchange know how and enhance national, regional (South America) and international network-strengthening. 

Fundraising and social trend-watching for innovative international cooperation/grant funds (a.o. CMC, PSO, Cordaid, Stichting Kinderpostzegels, Stichting Advocaten voor Advocaten, etc.)

Organizing national, regional (South America) and international capacity-building workshops and training seminars, including at the National Police Academy (in Brasília) identifying good and bad practices.

Analysis of cases and situation of human trafficking in Brazil and referral, including sexual exploitation (also of children and adolescents) and slave labor. 

Examples: https://www.iom.int/jahia/webdav/shared/shared/mainsite/microsites/IDM/workshops/ensuring_protection_070909/collateral_damage_gaatw_2007.pdf (p.135-161)
profile_positions.title: International Lawyer (Founder and Ex-Coordinator)

profile_positions.description:
Managing a Rio de Janeiro based consortium of three non-governmental organizations (grass-roots and community-based IBISS; human rights organization Projeto Legal; black women's organization Criola) and the law-faculty of the Unigranrio University, including a technical staff of 5 specialists.

Liaising with Brazilian governmental (municipal, state and federal) agencies, such as the Public Prosecutor´s Office and Secretariats and Ministries in cases of human trafficking and sexual exploitation. 

Example: https://www.nrc.nl/nieuws/2009/04/09/pams-leven-is-stuk-na-de-pornofotos-11710668-a427176;  https://www.trouw.nl/home/teveel-hulp-voor-pornoduo~ab6c998b/ 

Consultancy on the elaboration and evaluation of the 1st National (Brazilian) Plan Against Human Trafficking (2008).

Elaboration of (written) instructions and manuals.

Examples: Criteria and Factors for the Identification of Possible Victims of Human Trafficking (pp 1-40) https://www.justica.gov.br/sua-protecao/trafico-de-pessoas/publicacoes/anexos/criterios-e-fatores-de-identificacao-de-supostas-vitimas-de-etp.pdf/view;  Human Trafficking: Gender, race, children and adolescents (pp 135-161) https://www.justica.gov.br/sua-protecao/trafico-de-pessoas/publicacoes/anexos/desafiosperspectivasl.pdf; 

Honourable mention 1st "Libertas" anti-human trafficking article contest of the Brazilian Federal Ministry of Justice.
profile_positions.title: Executive Coordinator

company.name: Federal Brazilian Ministries of Justice, Social Development and Women's Policies, UNDP, UNODC, a.o.

profile_positions.company: Federal Brazilian Ministries of Justice, Social Development and Women's Policies, UNDP, UNODC, a.o.
profile_positions.description: Independent legal consultant on Human Rights, Human Trafficking, Migration, Ethics & Compliance, CSR (Corporate Social Responsibility), Fundraising and Portfolio Management at: (amongst others) the Federal Brazilian Ministries of Justice (MJ), Social Development (MDS) and Women's Rights Policies (SPM), UNDP (United Nations Development Programme), UNODC (United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime), GAATW (Global Alliance Against Traffic in Women), GCIM (The Global Commission on International Migration) and the Holanda/Brasil Foundation. Period of 2015/2017, on behalf of PROJETO TRAMA, an elected member of the deliberative National Anti-Human Trafficking Committee CONATRAP at the Federal Ministry of Justice (MJ/SNJ).
profile_positions.title: Independent Legal Consultant on Governance and Human Rights issues

profile_positions.location: Avenida Beira Mar 406 - 1205, Centro, CEP 20021-900, Rio de Janeiro/RJ, Brazil
profile_positions.description:
International lawyer and Brazilian legal intern.

Legal advice and law-practice for foreigners in Brazil concerning Brazilian and (International) Civil, Corporate, Criminal, Human Rights  and Family Law.

Dutch law-faculty completed (1994) at the University of Leiden, "meester in de rechten" (The Netherlands). Brazilian law-faculty completed suma cum laude (2008) at the Universidade do Grande Rio (Brazil).

Ex-practising immigration and administrative lawyer in and oustide Courts in the Netherlands (1998-2004).
profile_positions.title: International lawyer, specializing in Brazilian (International) Law

profile_positions.description:
Providing (broad) legal aid to asylum seekers and migrants in and outside court of law in order to obtain refugee and/or other immigration status through a system indirectly financed by the Dutch Ministry of Justice, with due registration at the "Raad voor de Rechtsbijstand".

Ad-interim legal coordinator of the SRA Legal Aid Office at Amsterdam International Airport "Schiphol” from 01/01/2001 till 30/06/2001.

Capacity-building and legal training of newly accredited attorneys, lawyers,  interns and military police (“Koninklijke Marechaussee”).
profile_positions.title: Specialised Senior Attorney Immigration and Administrative Law

company.name: IBISS Brazilian Institute for Innovations in Social Healthcare

profile_positions.company: IBISS Brazilian Institute for Innovations in Social Healthcare
profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the analysis of cases of human rights violations, especially considering children, adolescents and youngsters, in order to prepare and present international denunciations, especially to the Inter-American Commission on Human Rights (IACHR/OAS) - its competence recognized by the Brazilian Government only 3 years earlier. 

Examples: http://cidh.org/annualrep/99eng/Merits/Brazil11.598.htm, http://cidh.org/annualrep/99eng/Merits/Brazil11.599.htm,

Liaising with Brazilian and international human rights NGO's (such as Human Rights Watch and Amnesty International) in order to exchange know how and enhance network-strengthening. 

Organizing capacity-building workshops and training seminars identifying good and bad practices. 

Fundraising and social trend-watching for innovative international cooperation/grant funds.

Elaboration of (written) instructions, manuals and analyses.
profile_positions.title: Human Rights Lawyer Projeto Legal
